text:
The 2018 Oscars have come and gone, however the glamour will stay on.

We’ll be speaking concerning the standout fashion moments for years, with many re-creating the seems for their very own particular occasions…sans Hollywood finances. Fortunately, Marie Claire senior style editor and E! Information fashion correspondent Zanna Roberts Rassi broke down Sunday night time’s greatest seems—and find out how to get them for much less, within the video above.

In the event you’re able to stroll down the aisle in all white—just like the customized Chanel gown Margot Robbie wore, you’ll be able to rating an analogous embellished look (which additionally exposes some leg whereas it is at it) for a mere $sixty nine from Bloomingdale’s.
title: Get the Oscar Looks for Less: Jennifer Garner, Emma Stone and More
